thread.title: Model born with “cat eye syndrome” is featured in breathtaking fashion photo shoot
thread.title_full: Model born with “cat eye syndrome” is featured in breathtaking fashion photo shoot

author: Gina Florio
title: Model born with “cat eye syndrome” is featured in breathtaking fashion photo shoot
text:
Model born with “cat eye syndrome” is featured in breathtaking fashion photo shoot 29-year-old artist and model Caitin Stickels is making new splashes in the fashion world with a breathtaking editorial in V Magazine . She collaborated with Nick Knight, one of the most renowned and influential photographers out there today, and it’s an especially unique project because Caitin has Cat Eye Syndrome , a rare chromosomal disease that causes facial deformities and a “cat-like” appearance of the eyes.
It’s so refreshing to see a beautiful woman like Caitin grace the pages of a high fashion magazine, considering the fact that nearly all the woman featured in magazines fit a conventional standard of beauty that doesn’t apply to the majority of people in our society. Caitin has always been interested in fashion, and doing this photo shoot with Nick Knight has fulfilled some of her greatest dreams.
Here are some of the pictures from the V Magazine spread.
don't make such a fuss, princess. [goddess i love this dress] @Regrann from @nick_knight - The wonderful @caitinkitten in @mollymgoddard for my story " portrait of Caitin Stickel " which launched today on @showstudio and @vmagazine . @martincullen65 did the hair , @lauradomini2 did the make up @bangbangnails did the nails. @kjeldgaard1 did the styling and @tomotattle did the sets. 
A post shared by caitin stickels (@caitinkitten) on Mar 10, 2017 at 10:04am PST 
the psychic tether remains the same no matter how much we pull from the purity of the truth because primal hearts are much too wild and will continue to be forever untamed. @Regrann from @nick_knight - "The beautiful @caitinkitten wears Dior for my story "Portrait of Caitin Stickels" on @showstudio and in @vmagazine . Styling @kjeldgaard1 Sets @tomotattle Hair @martincullen65 make up @lauradomini2 nails @bangbangnails ." 
A post shared by caitin stickels (@caitinkitten) on Mar 12, 2017 at 11:59am PDT 
perfection is never perfect and division is an oppressive illusion. within all beauty there is something wicked waiting to be brought to fruition. perhaps one day, instead of feeling divided by diversity, there may be a union. @Regrann from @nick_knight - "The wonderful @caitinkitten modelling @junyawatanabeofficial for my story " Portrait of Caitin Stickels " which is on @showstudio and in @vmagazine . Styled by the brilliant @kjeldgaard1 . Set by @tomotattle, hair by @martincullen65 make up @lauradomini2 nails @bangbangnails . Assisting @brittlloyd1 and @robrusling123" 
A post shared by caitin stickels (@caitinkitten) on Mar 11, 2017 at 4:59pm PST 
The colors of the photo shoot are stunning, and Caitin simply takes our breath away. Just one look at these pictures and we’re convinced that she was born to be a high fashion model.
my heart won't stop beating. "@Regrann from @nick_knight - The absolutely stunning @caitinkitten from the story I am releasing tomorrow in @vmagazine and on @showstudio . #internationalwomensday Hair @martincullen65 makeup @lauradomini2 nails @bangbangnails styling @kjeldgaard1" 
A post shared by caitin stickels (@caitinkitten) on Mar 8, 2017 at 8:31pm PST 
Caitin had the chance to write about her experience for the V Magazine profile . “I always admired [Nick Knight’s work] from afar and meanwhile tried to recreate my own expressions through fashion, photography, and art,” Caitin wrote. She says it was an absolute dream come true to work with Nick and the stylists. “I did expect to see something epic—and they went far and beyond what I could have imagined,” she said.
“This collaboration has been the most beautiful whirlwind of my life,” Caitin wrote. and i still can't breathe...it was incredible modeling, moving and singing for this otherworldly fashion film. this is as vulnerablw as it gets, in the best of ways. i treasure this film of fashion, emotion and voice that i was involved in with @nick_knight at @showstudio and edited by @younjiku "from @showstudio - NEW! After discovering her on Instagram, Nick Knight invited @caitinkitten to model for @vmagazine. Born with rare chromosomal disorder, Cat Eye Syndrome, Stickels presents the antithesis to the quintessential model. Amongst a raw textural polystyrene set by @tomotattle, Stickels is captured in looks by @dior, @MollyMGoddard and @Prada, styled by @kjeldgaard1, with Make-up by @lauradomini2 and hair by @martincullen65. This is a clip of the accompanying fashion film - with edit, 3D Art and sound by @younjiku. Head to SHOWstudio to watch the film in full and to peruse the full editorial!" 
A post shared by caitin stickels (@caitinkitten) on Mar 10, 2017 at 10:46am PST 
If you look at the rest of Caitin’s Instagram profile, it’s clear to see that she’s always been a fashion-forward woman, so it’s a treat to see her expression of art and fashion make it to the mainstream public. We hope we see a lot more of her in the future!
